title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Lowered Eclipse version requirement for Copilot extension from 2024-09 to 2024-03.
Updated audit log event titles from "Canceling a workflow" to "Canceling a workflow run" across multiple environments.
Renamed GitHub Apps permissions for pre-receive hooks to "Organization pre-receive hooks" and "Repository pre-receive hooks" for clarity.
Updated OpenAPI schema descriptions and endpoint documentation formatting.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:

- Updated audit log event titles from "Canceling a workflow" to "Canceling a workflow run" across multiple environments.
- Renamed GitHub Apps permissions for pre-receive hooks to "Organization pre-receive hooks" and "Repository pre-receive hooks" for clarity.
- Updated OpenAPI schema descriptions and endpoint documentation formatting.
